title: Film: the art of the impossible
brief_description: Film director Michael Ritchie analyses selected sequences from well known films and demonstrates some of the devices used to make scenes realistic and to create drama. Includes the use of the camera, sound, lighting, script, casting choices and direction of actors, sets, costumes and music.
